snippet: The case resembles another in which aggressive treatment of a baby born with the virus that causes AIDS failed to prevent its resurgence.
abstract: Study in medical journal The Lancet details case in Italy of child aggressively and successfully treated with AIDS drugs after being born with HIV, only to suffer resurgence of the virus soon after the drugs were stopped.
lead_paragraph: The case resembles another in which aggressive treatment of a baby born with the virus that causes AIDS failed to prevent its resurgence.

headline.main: Italy: Child Thought to Be Rid of H.I.V. Suffers a Relapse
headline.print_headline: Italy: Child Suffers H.I.V. Setback After Aggressive Early Drug Treatment
